Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.ports.PortI

  • Packages that use PortI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components
    Basic component model.
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.cvm
    Component virtual machines for both single computer and distributed deployments.
    fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc
    Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.ports  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter
    Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter provides a filtering component that behaves as a sensor so that sensor clients need not know whether they are connected to sensors or filters.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge
    Component and port for gauges The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge provides a gauge component used to display value read from a sensor.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports
    Ports for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports provides ports for random number generation components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor
    Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor provides a sensor simulator component and its port used to offer its service.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.delegates
    Component assemblies for both single computer and distributed deployments.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports
    Ports d'accès au service du SynchronizerManager Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports fournit les ports inbound et outbound qui permettent d'utiliser les services du SynchronizerManager.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue
    Ports d'accès aux services du ArrayBlockingQueue Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation ArrayBlockingQueue.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.countDownLatch
    Ports d'accès aux services du CountDownLatch Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.countDownLatch fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation CountDownLatch.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.cyclicBarrier
    Ports d'accès aux services du CyclicBarrier Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.cyclicBarrier fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation CyclicBarrier.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.semaphore
    Ports d'accès aux services du Semaphore Le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.ports.syncTools.semaphore fournit les ports utiles pour l'outil de synchronisation Semaphore.
    fr.upmc.components.patterns.dconnection
    Component dynamic interconnection pattern.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc that implement PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicallyConnectableComponentInboundPort
      The class DynamicallyConnectableComponentInboundPort reifies the DynamicallyConnectableComponentI offered interface for a component and connects it to the requiring component through a DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector connector.
      class  DynamicallyConnectableComponentOutboundPort
      The class DynamicallyConnectableComponentOutboundPort reifies the DynamicallyConnectableComponentI required interface for a component and connects it to the offering component through a DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector connector.
      class  DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort
      The class DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort implements the inbound port of a DynamicCOmponentCreator component.
      class  DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort
      The class DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort implements the outbound port of a DynamicCOmponentCreator client component.

      The class URIGetterOutboundPort implements the outbound port of a component that requires an URI service through the URIConsumerI interface.

      The class URIProviderInboundPort defines the inbound port exposing the interface URIProviderI for components of type URIProvider.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports that implement PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RNGDataInboundPort
      The class RNGDataInboundPort implements the inbound port of a component of type RNGProducerI offering a random number generation service through the data offered interface RNGDataOfferedI.
      class  RNGDataOutboundPort
      The class RNGDataOutboundPort implements a random number data outbound port for components of type NormalRNGenerator.
      class  RNGTriggerInboundPort
      The class RNGTriggerInboundPort implements the inbound port of a component of type RNGProducerI offering a trigger service for random number generation service in push mode, through the offered interface RNGTriggerI.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.upmc.components.patterns.dconnection

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.patterns.dconnection that implement PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicConnectionRequestInboundPort
      The class DynamicConnectionInboundPort implements the server side port used to request and establish dynamic connections among components.
      class  DynamicConnectionRequestOutboundPort
      The class DynamicConnectionOutboundPort implements the client side port used to request and establish dynamic connections among components.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.patterns.dconnection that return PortI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract PortI DynamicConnectionRequestBehaviour.createAndPublishClientSideDynamicPort()
      on the client side, create and publish the new client side dynamically connected port, and therefore determine what type of port must be created.
      protected abstract PortI DynamicConnectionRequestBehaviour.createAndPublishServerSideDynamicPort()
      on the server side, create and publish the new server side dynamically connected port, and therefore determine what type of port must be created.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.upmc.components.ports

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.ports with type parameters of type PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PortSet<PI extends PortI>
      The class PortSet implements a set on port exposing the same interface.
      Subinterfaces of PortI in fr.upmc.components.ports 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataInboundPortI
      The interface DataInboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than being called for their services.
      interface  DataOutboundPortI
      The interface DataOutboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than calling providers for their services.
      interface  DataTwoWayPortI
      The interface DataTwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for exchanging data among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      interface  InboundPortI
      The interface InboundPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming calls from client components towards the service providers.
      interface  OutboundPortI
      The interface OutBoundPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for outgoing calls from a component towards its service providers.
      interface  TwoWayPortI
      The interface TwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming and outgoing calls among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      Classes in fr.upmc.components.ports that implement PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataInboundPort
      The class AbstractDataInboundPort partially implements an inbound port for data exchanging components.
      class  AbstractDataOutboundPort
      The class AbstractDataOutboundPort partially implements an outbound port for data exchanging components.
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayPort partially implements a data two-way port for components exchanging data with each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      class  AbstractInboundPort
      The class AbstractInboundPort partially implements an inbound port which implements the offered interface of the provider component so that the provider can be called through this port.
      class  AbstractOutboundPort
      The class AbstractOutboundPort partially implements an outbound port which implements the required interface of the owning component so that it can call its providers through this port.
      class  AbstractPort
      The class AbstractPort represents the basic properties and behaviors of ports in the component model.
      class  AbstractTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractTwoWayPort partially implements a two-way port for components calling each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
